name: Pantron 2001
description:
Happy New Year 2001!

Pantron 2001 - Alpha 0.1 A Game by Marcus Horn / Siactro

Music by the amazing Loveshadow featuring Omnivista. CCMixter

Loveshadow / CC BY 3.0

Sounds by Mike Koenig/Grant Evans SoundBible

Fonts by Tepid Monkey and Blaise Kal

What is Pantron 2001?

I have no freakin idea... it is just "something" I made after a long creativity block. This is only an alpha version I made in a few days so expect some updates for it soon.

Check out my website for more games!
